item.title: Fosun Wealth Holdings Becomes a DBS Bank Tokenization Structured Note Distributor
item.description: On August 24th, Fosun Wealth Management has emerged as one of the distributors of DBS Bank's tokenized structured notes. The tokenized structured notes product being distributed this time is a participation note linked to cryptocurrency. It provides cash payouts when the prices of digital assets rise and limits downside risk. (ChainDD)

item.title: An Ethereum ICO Participant Awakens After a Decade of Silence, ICO Returns Soar by 15,484x
item.description: On August 24th, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, an Ethereum ICO participant with the address "0x7d03" has come out of its more than 10-year dormancy. They conducted a test transaction 5 hours ago, transferring 0.01 ETH.The address "0x7d03" only invested $15.5 in the ICO and received 49.93 ETH. Now, it is worth $240,000, with an astonishing return of 15,484 times.

item.title: WLFI TOP10 Address has received a total of $73.08 million in investment and holds 4.63% of the total tokens.
item.description: On August 24th, on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa) disclosed the data overview of the WLFI TOP10 holders, which includes:The TOP10 addresses collectively injected $73.08 million and hold 4.63% of the tokens, with a total of 4.64 billion tokens.100% of the TOP10 addresses participated in the first public sale round, and one address also made additional investments in the second round.The TOP1 holder address, moonmanifest.eth, holds more than 1 billion tokens and ranks first.Based on the current contract price of $0.2843, the unlocked 20% of the TGE tokens is valued at $264 million.Note: The TOP10 Holder statistics only cover participants in the public sale round and exclude those from strategic rounds/advisors/partners.

item.title: Japan is planning to impose a 20% unified tax on cryptocurrency transactions and promote the issuance of ETFs through tax law revision.
item.description: On August 24th, as per the report in Nikkei, the Japan Financial Services Agency (FSA) intends to mandate a review of the manner in which cryptocurrency transactions are handled during the 2026 fiscal year and is planning to refer to the treatment of listed stocks. The request will be officially submitted by the end of August. This includes transferring cryptocurrency gains to a distinct tax bracket and imposing a 20% flat tax rate. As part of the tax reform, industry participants are also seeking a three-year carryforward of losses. Currently, in Japan, cryptocurrency income is regarded as "miscellaneous income" and is subject to a progressive tax rate of up to 55%, excluding local taxes.The proposal from the Japan Financial Bureau will also assist Japanese companies in easily launching domestic cryptocurrency ETFs, thereby enhancing the competitiveness of the Japanese cryptocurrency industry. In addition to tax reform, the Financial Bureau also plans to draft legislation in

item.title: Musk: Grok 2.5 Model Open Sourced, Grok 3 to Follow in About 6 Months
item.description: On August 24th, Musk tweeted that the Grok 2.5 model was our finest model of the previous year and has now become open source. The Grok 3 will be made open source in approximately 6 months.

item.title: A whale has increased its holdings of 17.89 billion PEPE tokens in the past 24 hours, worth approximately $2 million.
item.description: On August 24th, as per the monitoring of OnchainLens, a whale address utilized 2 million USDT to acquire 17.89 billion PEPE tokens within the past 24 hours.

item.title: A trader has taken a 3x short position on WLFI, currently facing a unrealized loss of over $412,000.
item.description: On August 24th, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, trader 0xbfaa established a 3x leveraged short position of 5.3 million WLFI tokens, which was worth $1.53 million. Currently, the trader is at a loss of more than $412,000.

item.title: WLFI Team: "Aave Will Receive 7% of the Total Supply of WLFI Token" Claim is False
item.description: On August 24th, as reported by Wu Shuo, the WLFI team stated that the claim "Aave will receive 7% of the total WLFI token supply" is false and is nothing but fake news.However, in a contradictory manner, according to a previously released proposal, as a WLFI lending ecosystem partner, Aave. In this Aave v3 instance, WLFI will adopt the same reserve factor mechanism as the main Aave instance. AaveDAO will receive 20% of the protocol fees generated by the WLFI Aave v3 instance and will obtain approximately 7% of the total WLFI token supply for participating in future WLFI governance processes, liquidity mining, and driving the decentralization of the WLFI platform.Last night, a suspected member of the WLFI Wallet team, Dylan_0x (@0xDylan_), denied the association of the proposal that "Aave will receive 7% of the WLFI total token supply." As a result, AAVE experienced a short-term drop of more than 5%. At 20:30 yesterday, Aave founder Stani.eth responded to questions about "Is the rel

item.title: A Whale Shorts ETH, WLFI, and XPL, with a Total Position Value Exceeding $50 Million
item.description: On August 24th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale established a new wallet address (0x54D7) two hours ago and deposited 5.42 million USDC into Hyperliquid for shorting ETH, WLFI, and XPL.The current short positions are as follows:10,641 ETH, with a value of $51.2 million;396,711 WLFI, with a value of $116,800;53,793 XPL, with a value of $29,300.

item.title: Ethereum Surges Above $4800, 24-hour Loss Narrows to 0.24%
item.description: On August 24th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum exceeded $4800, and it decreased by 0.24% in the past 24 hours.
